data.text:
@SenHydeSmith Sen Hyde Smith, thank you for getting online & explaining your vote, enlightening our understanding of the bill & your choice

Our reps should make it SOP to explain bills, in detail, to Taxpayers before they come to a vote so we can know how to provide OUR input beforehand
@SenHydeSmith Thank you, Senator.  God Bless America, God Bless Mississippi.
@SenHydeSmith Nope not our problem. NO AMNESTY FOR ILLEGALS vote NO on the Amnesty Act
@SenHydeSmith Someone is worried about her Senate seat🤣🤣🤣  a vote aganist this RINO is a vote for Mississippi. I can't wait to vote aganist you.

@MaxEdwards1 @SenHydeSmith That means you’re against Trump as well, because he asked them to vote that way. Also, the funds are needed to assist the South African refugees who were held in limbo when Trump froze all refugee funding as soon as he took office.
@SenHydeSmith Have you thought about the fact that many of these children will end being trafficked for sex?!
